dct:title.value: Animal performance and forestomach growth of dairy calves fed milk or milk replacer
Desempenho animal e desenvolvimento do rúmen de bezerros leiteiros aleitados com leite integral ou sucedâneo

bibo:abstract.value: 2) feeding of 4L of milk until 2 weeks of age and 4L of milk replacer thereafter. Animals were individualized, receiving starter feed and water "ad libitum". After 8 weeks, calves were slaughtered for forestomach development evaluation. There were no treatments effects (P>0.05) on starter intake, live weight, daily gain or days to reach intake for early weaning. A significant effect (P

The objective of this trial was the evaluation of milk or milk replacer feeding effects on performance and forestomach growth on dairy calves. Eight newborn Holstein calves were distributed on two types of liquid feed: 1) feeding of 4L of milk until 8 weeks of age
